name: "I"
description:
This is a very short  interactive fiction where you play as a boy in his youth searching for a meaning in his repetitive boring life. You will go trough his daily life and meet people on the way of discovering how and what he feels.

This is just my attempt at writing a multi-choice story. I'll be learning how to write code and will try to make video games but I also had this idea and just wanted to finish something. Game was made with Squiffy and I had no experience with it so please excuse it's blandness. This is also an experiment on my part for the time loop thingy. I always wandered why no one uses it to express that boring and repetitive life style of ours. Don't know how well I pulled it off but here's to hope that I did a good job.
